subject: Football (College)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Players’ families will be reimbursed for some travel expenses for the College Football Playoff’s title game and the men’s and women’s basketball Final Fours, the N.C.A.A. said.
snippet: Players’ families will be reimbursed for some travel expenses for the College Football Playoff’s title game and the men’s and women’s basketball Final Fours, the N.C.A.A. said.
